hero.tail: builds apps, plugins, and web products.
hero.subtitle: A product studio where we ship our own ideas, including apps, plugins, and web experiences, using a scalable, motion-first system. We also take on a small number of collaborations when it’s a strong fit.

featuredApps.title: What’s live under the Innova umbrella
featuredApps.desc: A snapshot of current builds. Some are public and some are in progress. Everything is created to test real usage and iterate fast.

work.title: One hub. Many products.
work.desc: InnovaApps is the studio home. Individual products can launch under the umbrella first. When it earns it, the product can graduate into its own brand.
work.hubDesc: innovaapps.ca is the umbrella site for studio overview, product directory, docs, notes, and announcements. Keep it clean, calm, and evergreen.
work.growDesc: New products can start as a subdomain MVP. When traction is real, we split it to its own domain, billing, and roadmap.

stack.title: A clean system for apps, plugins, and websites
stack.desc: React plus a reusable UI system built to ship fast without sacrificing polish. Motion, components, and structure are shared across products.

motionGuide.title: Motion that feels premium and not loud
motionGuide.desc: Consistent motion rules keep interactions crisp, readable, and intentional, especially on light UI.

principles.title: Fast in, soft out
principles.desc: Small UI responses happen quickly, then ease out for polish.

principles.title: Depth, not bounce
principles.desc: Use subtle lift and glow instead of overshoot and wobble.

principles.title: Scroll reveals
principles.desc: Sections reveal on entry with a consistent offset and calm timing.

principles.title: Pointer parallax
principles.desc: Keep parallax subtle and responsive to reduce fatigue.

apps.title: Explore what the studio is building
apps.desc: Apps, plugins, and web products. Some are live and some are experimental. Everything is built to learn fast and scale cleanly.
apps.ctaDesc: We occasionally partner with founders and teams when the fit is strong. This is especially true for motion first landing pages, plugin concepts, and MVP launches.

contact.title: Have something worth building?
contact.desc: Share what you’re working on. If it fits the studio’s direction, we’ll reply with next steps.
contact.tip: Tip: Replace alerts with your email capture / backend when ready.

socialProof.title: Built in public. Proof over hype.
socialProof.desc: This studio is product first. We ship, measure, refine, and graduate what wins. Case studies and metrics get added as products mature.

testimonials.name: InnovaApps
testimonials.quote: We keep the UI system consistent across apps so shipping faster doesn’t mean starting over.

caseStudies.title: Humberto AI
caseStudies.summary: Flagship build under active iteration and polish.

caseStudies.title: Plugin Studio
caseStudies.summary: Rapid experiments and utilities with a shared design system.

caseStudies.title: Innova Cloud
caseStudies.summary: Shared infrastructure to support every product under the umbrella.

story.title: A studio designed to keep shipping
story.desc: InnovaApps exists to build and evolve products without losing polish, from first MVP to standalone brand.
story.panelDesc: We build in validated steps. We ship something small, learn from real usage, then expand into a full product surface.

highlights.title: Start small
highlights.desc: Launch a plugin, landing page, or MVP quickly with a premium baseline.

highlights.title: Prove value
highlights.desc: Measure real usage and refine the product before scaling complexity.

highlights.title: Graduate winners
highlights.desc: When a product earns it, it becomes its own world with domain, billing, and roadmap.

conversion.title: Explore, follow, or collaborate
conversion.desc: Choose the path that matches what you’re here for. See what’s built, keep up with launches, or propose a collaboration.
conversion.panelDesc: If your idea fits the studio’s direction, we can help with MVPs, plugins, or motion first web builds.

appsList.name: Humberto AI
appsList.blurb: A flagship build under the Innova umbrella, shipped, iterated, and improved in public.
appsList.description: Humberto AI is a flagship product built inside the studio. It starts under the Innova umbrella and can evolve into a standalone brand as it grows.

appsList.name: Plugin Studio
appsList.blurb: Small utilities, shipped fast, kept polished through a shared system.
appsList.description: Plugin Studio is where fast ideas become real tools. It’s the experimentation engine for InnovaApps and the place where plugins become products.

appsList.name: Innova Cloud
appsList.blurb: Shared auth, analytics, and deployments for the studio ecosystem.
appsList.description: Innova Cloud unifies common infrastructure across products so each new build starts with a production grade foundation.
